text: Steichen's The Pond-Moonlight Billy the Kid Tobolsk Kremlin by Dmitry Medvedev This is a list of the 26 highest prices paid for photographs (in US dollars unless otherwise stated). Retrieved on 2011-08-01. |-valign="top" ! 26 | Cindy Sherman || Untitled #48 (1979) || align=right | $1,565,000 || || Christie's New York |- |} ==Disputed claims== # In December 2014, Peter Lik reportedly sold a photograph titled Phantom to an anonymous bidder for $6.5 million, making it potentially the highest price paid for a photograph. Lik's claim has been greeted with much scepticism. Claims of the sale have never been proven, and the buyer has not come forward, though a lawyer claiming to represent the buyer claims that the deal was real. # In 2015 Kevin Abosch reportedly sold a photograph called Potato #345 (2010) to an anonymous bidder for $1 million. ==See also== *List of most expensive paintings *List of most expensive sculptures *List of most expensive artworks by living artists *List of most expensive books and manuscripts ==References== ==External links== *Artnet top ten most expensive photographs, April 2003 *The two most expensive Stieglitz photos, 2006, click thumbnails to enlarge Most expensive photographs Category:Lists of photography topics Photographs Most Expensive Photographs, Most Expensive
title: List of most expensive photographs
